Study Details:
Study Type: subchronic
Species: male and female F344 rats
Mode of Administration: gavage
(corn oil)
Exposure Regime: 0, 25, 50, 100, 200,
or 400 mg/kg , 5 days/week
BW
Duration: 13 weeks
Uncertainty Factors: 3000 (10 for
intraspecies variability, 10 for interspecies
variability, 10 for use of a subchronic
study, and 3 for database deficiencies)
TRV Derivation Method:
NOAEL adjusted for
continuous exposure
NOAEL = 71 mg/kg -day
adj BW
TDI = NOAEL /UF
adj
(rounded to
2.0E-02 mg/kg -day)
BW
Carcinogenicity Classification:
CEPA:
not assessed
IARC:
Group 2B
possibly
carcinogenic to
humans
(IARC, 2002)
US EPA IRIS:
Group C
possibly
carcinogenic
to humans
(US EPA, 1998f)

Study Details:
Study Type: chronic
Species: F344 rats
Mode of Administration: inhalation
(whole body exposure chambers)
Exposure Regime: 0, 10, 30, or 60 ppm
(0, 52, 157, or 315 mg/m3) for 6 hours per
day plus T (12 minutes for the time to
90
achieve 90% of the target concentration
after vapour generation), 5 days per week
Duration: 105 weeks
Uncertainty Factors: 1000 (10 for
intraspecies variability, 10 for interspecies
variability, and 10 for database defciiencies)
TRV Derivation Method:
LOAEL adjusted for
continuous exposure
LOAEL =
adj
9.3 mg/m3 (1.8 ppm)
TC = LOAEL /UF
adj
Critical Effect(s):
Respiratory tract
toxicity
(nasal lesions
[neuroblastoma
of the olfactory
epithelium, and
adenoma of the
respiratory
epithelium of
the nose])

Study Details:
Study Type: reproductive
Species: female Long-Evans rats
Mode of Administration: oral
(drinking water)
Exposure Regime: 0, 10, 50, and
250 ppm Ni2+ (equivalent to 0, 1.3, 6.7,
and 31.6 mg Ni2+/kg -day, respectively)
BW
Duration: 11 weeks prior to mating (with
unexposed males). Nickel administration
continued through two successive
gestation and lactation periods.
Uncertainty Factors: 1000 (10 for
intraspecies variability, 10 for interspecies
variability, and 10 for use of a LOAEL
instead of a NOAEL)
Carcinogenicity Classification:
See nickel, mixture
of oxidic, sulfidic
and soluble
inorganic nickel
compounds
